item.title: Adobe Community Professional Pins Are In!
item.description: Sweeeet. I got home and on my keyboard is sitting a letter from Liz Frederick at Adobe. I open it up and discover that my nifty magnetic ACP pin is in there, as well as stickers! I love stickers!
